'''LEGO Minecraft: Armorsmith Adventure''' is an activity book expanding on the world of [[LEGO Minecraft]].

== Summary ==
{{Quote|Meet the [[Armorsmith]]. He’s a hardworking, adventurous smithy who spends his days crafting cool [[weapon]]s and [[Armor]].

Build your Armorsmith minifigure and kit him out with his [[sword]] and other accessories, before completing the puzzles, reading the comics and finding out all about his life in the LEGO® Minecraft® Universe!|Book description}}
